mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PET WHERE PET_NAME LIKE '%${pet_name}%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM WAITING_NUM, A.* FROM( SELECT P.PET_NAME, P.PET_TYPE, P.PET_SEX, P.PET_AGE, A.* FROM PET P, PETACCEPT A WHERE P.PET_CODE = A.PETACCEPT_PETCODE AND A.STORE_CODE = #{STORE_CODE} AND A.PETACCEPT_VIEW = 'N' ORDER BY A.PETACCEPT_DATE ) A)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM WAITING_NUM, A.* FROM( SELECT P.PET_NAME, P.PET_TYPE, P.PET_SEX, P.PET_AGE, A.*, H.PETHISTORY_TODAY, H.PETHISTORY_KEY FROM PET P, PETACCEPT A, PETHISTORY H WHERE A.PETACCEPT_CODE = H.PETACCEPT_CODE AND P.PET_CODE = A.PETACCEPT_PETCODE AND A.STORE_CODE = #{STORE_CODE} AND A.PETACCEPT_VIEW = 'Y' ORDER BY H.PETHISTORY_TODAY ) A)
select h.*, p.pet_name, p.pet_type, p.pet_sex, p.pet_age from pethistory h, pet p where h.pethistory_key = #{pethistory_key} and h.pethistory_petcode = p.pet_code
